import java.util.Vector;

public class ThreadsAdding implements Runnable {
	
	private Vector<Integer> X;
	private Vector<Integer> Y;
	private Vector<Integer> Q;
	
	public ThreadsAdding(Vector<Integer> inX, Vector<Integer> inY, Vector<Integer> inQ)
	{
		X = inX;
		Y = inY;
		Q = inQ;
	}
	
	@Override
	public void run() 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for(int i = 0; i < X.size(); ++i)
		{
			Q.add(X.get(i) + Y.get(i));
		}
	}

}
